text_block_list.text:
It's been a few days since I've become 
a trainer at Tracen Academy.

An error occurred. No applicable buildings 
found at the target coordinates.

I spot a lone horse girl standing motionless 
as I walk through the downtown area.

My device's GPS function also displays an error. 
Returning error code 404.

That badge identifies you as a trainer from Tracen Academy. 
Nice to meet you. My name is Mihono Bourbon.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I am currently returning error code 404. 
The newly opened training supplies store could not be found.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I was told to continue along this street for about 
100 meters, so I did. But I cannot find the store here.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Furthermore, my device is now giving me an error 
making it impossible to use the navigation software.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I'm not familiar with the store, but I should be able 
to look it up on my phone for her.
choice_data_list: I'll see if I can find it.

text_block_list.text: Much obliged.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
It didn't take long before I found it. 
It says it's about 42 meters from here. 
In fact, looking closely in the distance, I think I see it.
choice_data_list: <size=42>It's just a little further along the street.</size>
<size=42>It's just a little further along the street.</size>

text_block_list.text: Excuse me but... How far is 'a little?'
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: I need you to tell me the exact distance of 'a little'.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Forty...ish?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Input parsed. Thank you very much. 42 meters ahead. 
Confirming the discrepancy in the distance.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
This was an unexpected lapse in my own research. 
I have logged the error and will work to prevent this issue 
from occurring again in the future.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: I once again offer you my thanks for your help.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Commencing operation: Moving 42 meters ahead.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I kept her in sight just in case, and she did indeed reach 
the store. She stopped right in front of it and entered the door.

It is the day after I met that peculiar horse girl. 
I went to see a mock race, looking for horse girls 
wanting to be scouted.

Mihono Bourbon is participating in this race. Didn't she have 
great results even before she entered the academy?
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer

text_block_list.text:
She's a bit like a cyborg though. I've seen her on the grounds 
in person, but her personality's a bit strange...
text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer

text_block_list.text:
The stands are chock-full of other trainers looking to scout. 
We're all looking to snag horse girls who show potential.
*clang*

With that sound, the gates open. 
The horse girls, all wearing jerseys, fly out at once.
The leader's going strong!
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer

text_block_list.text:
One horse girl managed to break away from the pack 
right away. It was Mihono Bourbon. 
She leads with quite the distance.
*huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
The rumors were right, her speed is truly fascinating. 
The short distance racers are about to face 
an incredibly talented newcomer!
text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer

text_block_list.text:
She impresses everyone as she speeds down the 
home stretch with a huge lead over the rest.
*huff huff* Hngh!
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: She easily takes first place by a landslide.

When I met her downtown the other day, I never 
imagined she'd be so fast. Her ability stole my heart.

She looks very promising! 
I've got to get her before anyone else!
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer

text_block_list.text: It's no use. It seems she already has a trainer.
text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer

text_block_list.text:
And indeed, when I finally reached her, 
she was talking to another trainer.
He's a veteran trainer apparently. A real hotshot. Maaan, I can't believe I've been outdone like that.
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer

text_block_list.text:
He said he sees great promise in pursuing 
short distance races with her.
text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer

text_block_list.text:
If she's already found a trainer, then that's it for me. 
I guess I'll just secretly cheer her on from the sidelines 
from now on.

It's evening and time to head home. I take a stroll 
around the school grounds when suddenly...
*huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I spot Mihono Bourbon, who I suspect 
is doing some training by herself.

*huff huff* 1800 meters reached. 1200 meters remaining. 
Time elapsed: 2:04. Severely behind target pace.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Is she timing herself? And, wait... 
Did I hear that right?

Normally you shouldn't let a horse girl 
run this distance right after her debut. 
Her body isn't ready for it yet.
Hng!
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: *pant pant*
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Ugh...
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
She just fell over! 
I hurry towards her.
